subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The surging Yankees had a chance to beat the White Sox, but Mariano Rivera blew the save in the ninth inning when Paul Konerko hit a leadoff home run to tie the score.
snippet: The surging Yankees had a chance to beat the White Sox, but Mariano Rivera blew the save in the ninth inning when Paul Konerko hit a leadoff home run to tie the score.
